tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Going to a dentist, always frightens the person. BUT here at Delhi Dental Studio Dr. Priyank Bhandari and Dr. Surpreet Bhandari are super friendly,  they explain every minute details and brings you in comfort. They made our kiddo so relaxed and comfortable during the whole process, he was calm and composed during the process. Doctors like you are the torch bearers for the generations to come.
Thank you Dr., Rise n Shine

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I wanted to express my gratitude for the exceptional care and service I've received from Dr. Priyank. From the moment I walked into the office, the staff was warm and welcoming. Dr. Priyank has consistently demonstrated a high level of professionalism, expertise, and a genuine concern for my dental health. The quality of work and attention to detail in every procedure has been outstanding. I appreciate the clear explanations, the friendly demeanor, and the comfortable environment that the practice provides. I feel confident that I'm in good hands, and I highly recommend Dr. Priyank to anyone seeking top-notch dental care. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Priyank Bhandari is very efficient, friendly, cool and calm.  He treated very efficiently in getting root canal of teeth keeping in mind my diabetic condition.  His friendliness makes me comfortable in telling my problem and getting the solution

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was very friendly and he explained the problem to me deeply. He was very experienced in this. Overall 4.5 out of 5.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been to this dentist on recommendation of my nearest medical store before 15 days. Mr. Priyank is really well professional and entire clinic was complete taking the precaution very well. However, in terms of costing/pricing and treatment quality I am so unsatisfied. I went for my gums bleeding problem and did the scaling in his clinic. I understand dentist and clinic varies from location to location, whereas according to the treatment and experienced  carried by Dr. Priyank cost if not at all viable. 

He was demanding a consulting fee of Rs. 500 with additional Rs. 1200 for scaling. Since I carried only Rs. 1200 cash and after so much of request he agreed on Rs. 1200 and asked me to pay Rs. 300 on next visit . Post treatment too after 2 days gums bleeding didn't stop. Since he recommend me to revisit his clinic on 15th August, I tried reaching again and again but he was not responding. Finally his assistant cum reception guy called me and asked me to come down today @ 1:45 PM, after i reached there he insisted me a lot to pay 500 consulting fee and get the second round of treatment done. He was continuously going to Dr. Priyank's cabin and taking his instruction what need to done. I was ready to pay 300 rest balance, however he insisted me to pay 500 first then post treatment he will refund rest 200. Since the last treatment and commitment of doctor too via phone didn't happened on my gum bleeding problem, I though to stepped out and check with any **** doctor. I highly recommend not to visit this clinic ** *** *** ******* *** * ********* *** ** **** ******* *** **** ****** ** ****** ******** 

Quite expensive *** ************ ******* not co-operative in customers problem at all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Priyank is extremely understanding and explains the procedure very clearly. As one of his oldest patients, I am very happy with his way of treatment - meticulous and friendly. He is very competitive and doesn't belive in causing unnecessary pain to his patients. Thank you very much. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I recently had an excellent experience with Dr. Priyank Bhandari. The level of understanding they demonstrated regarding my specific dental concerns was truly impressive. Their attentiveness and ability to grasp my problem accurately made me feel confident in their care. Not only did they address my dental issues with precision, but they also provided valuable insights and recommendations for maintaining oral health. The overall atmosphere of the clinic was welcoming, and the staff were friendly and professional. 
I highly recommend Dr Priyank Bhandari and Dr. Surpreet Bhandari for their exceptional skills, understanding, and overall great dental care experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Mouth Guard,
review: My overall experience was great. Listens to the queries patiently and explains the solution for the treatent in a detailed manner. The staff is very well behaved and everything is organized be it the hygiene or handling the appointments. Surely recommend it to everyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It's very neat and clean place, It's quite pleasant experience and they have all the latest equipment in place, tooth x-ray in second to view in the screen in front. The dentist is also very experienced and very gentle And reasonable fees also. Would like to recommend and would visit later for routine teeth check up too.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Both the doctors are highly ******* professionals with ample amount of experience which can be known via their understanding of the problem and the detailed explanation they provide after the analysis. My case was handled by Dr. Surpreet, she is very gentle in treating the teeth which is very rare to find. The pricing is fair as well according to the treatment they are offering. Highly recommended dental clininc

I would like to recommend the clinic to my friends and family for sure.
